name: SKPhysicsJointLimit
desc: A joint that imposes a maximum distance between two physics bodies, as if they were connected by a rope.

items.name: class func joint(withBodyA: SKPhysicsBody, bodyB: SKPhysicsBody, anchorA: CGPoint, anchorB: CGPoint) -> SKPhysicsJointLimit
var maxLength: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum distance allowed between the two physics bodies connected by the limit joint.
